    • Constructor Detail

      • MCharacter

        public MCharacter(int posX,
                  int posY,
                  java.lang.String filePath,
                  java.util.ArrayList<MPlatform> obstacles)
        Instantiate a character at the specified location with the provided image information that interacts with the given obstacle list
        Parameters:
        posX - as int - The horizontal location initially of the character
        posY - as int - The vertical location initially of the character
        filePath - as String - The file location of the image to be used as the character
        obstacles - as ArrayList of PPObjects - The obstacles that the character should be aware of

    • Method Detail

        public void setObstacles(java.util.ArrayList<MPlatform> obstacles)
        Set the obstacles list for this character to interact with
        Parameters:
        obstacles - as ArrayList of PPObjects - The obstacles that the character should interact with

        Sets the location where a character will spawn
        Parameters:
        spawnX - The position on the x axis
        spawnY - The position on the y axis

        Initiate a jump of this character

        public MToken moveX(int value)
        Initiate horizontal movement of this character
        Parameters:
        value - as int - The magnitude and direction of the horizontal movement of the character
        Returns:
        The MToken object that is the token interacted with during the movement
